thread.title: Unborn Baby Dies After Gunman Opens Fire On Pregnant Woman
thread.title_full: Unborn Baby Dies After Gunman Opens Fire On Pregnant Woman

author: CBS Los Angeles
title: Unborn Baby Dies After Gunman Opens Fire On Pregnant Woman
text:
Unborn Baby Dies After Gunman Opens Fire On Pregnant Woman February 23, 2017 4:57 AM Filed Under: Shooting (Credit: CBS) 
SOUTH LOS ANGELES (CBSLA.com) — A pregnant woman remained hospitalized in critical condition Thursday for treatment of a gunshot wound. 
Police responded shortly after 2 a.m. to 77th Street near Raymond Avenue for reports of shots fired in the area. 
Upon their arrival, authorities located the unconscious woman lying partially naked on the ground with blood pooling around her. 
Paramedics transported her to a hospital. 
CBS2’s Kara Finnstrom reported the woman, believed to be in her 30s or 40s, is currently undergoing surgery. #LAPD confirms fetus of pregnant woman shot in South LA this AM has died, will be investigated as homicide. Woman in surgery #CBSLA 
— Kara Finnstrom (@KaraFinnstrom) February 23, 2017 
Detectives say the woman was far enough along in her pregnancy for the baby to survive on its own outside of the womb. 
The case is being investigated as a homicide. 
The motive for the shooting remains under investigation.
